title: B/S/H Home Appliances Corp (Germany)
desc: Software Engineering Intern at B/S/H, Germany. Gained hands-on experience in real-world projects and collaborative teamwork.

title: Graduated from NUIST
desc: Earned a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Software Engineering from Nanjing University of Information Science & Technology.

title: Nanjing Safirst Technology
desc: Joined Nanjing Safirst Technology as a Senior Developer, contributing to both frontend and backend projects.

title: Open Source: Peer-Stream
desc: Developed and maintained Peer-Stream, a lightweight WebRTC SDK for Unreal Engine Pixel Streaming, enhancing real-time communication.

title: Insigma Technology Co., Ltd.
desc: Became a Full Stack Developer and Technical Artist at Insigma Technology, working on innovative digital solutions.

title: Patent Granted: Web Design
desc: Granted a patent titled 'A Design Pattern of Web Components Based on Stack Machine'.

title: EI Paper: 3D Visual System
desc: Published a research paper in an EI-indexed journal: 'Design and Implementation of a 3D Visual System Based on Cloud Rendering'.

title: Duolingo English Test (CEFR B2)
desc: Achieved CEFR B2 level proficiency (120 points) in English via the Duolingo English Test.

title: XU Exponential University
desc: Pursuing a Master's degree in Artificial Intelligence at XU Exponential University of Applied Sciences.
